metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20615 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An out-of-bounds read issue was discovered in the HTTP/2 protocol decoder in HAProxy 1.8.x and 1.9.x through 1.9.0 which can result in a crash. The processing of the PRIORITY flag in a HEADERS frame requires 5 extra bytes, and while these bytes are skipped, the total frame length was not re-checked to make sure they were present in the frame.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20615` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

haproxy - 1.8.8-1ubuntu0.3
vim-haproxy - 1.8.8-1ubuntu0.3
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: haproxy package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.8.8-1ubuntu0.3').
